MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH46 & CH47 postcode areas of Wirral. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:54PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.17AM on 2nd February 2021.
